### Solved by superkojiman

The text file we're given contains all the info we need to solve it. I actually wrote a [script](https://gist.github.com/superkojiman/d547aa6e0eb10918243e) a while back just for solving CTF challenges such as this. 

```
koji@pwnbox32:~/Desktop/rsa$ rsa_solver.py 10   65537 

Solved: 45018999899301607803545263138321615275372200996055637149518621729

ASCII: modular_arithmetic_is_cool!
```

Flag is: modular_arithmetic_is_cool!
